title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available
description: The Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not visible.
OB: The Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be visible.
SR:
1. Launch the application. 
2. Go to the Navigator. 
3. Select both P1 and P2. 
4. Observe the menu items in the Navigator.
